name: Slo Moe's Space Salvage
description:
This game was built for the Lowest Poly Game Jam.

Play as Slow Moe the Sloth, the owner and operator of your very own Space Salvage company. Guide Moe's ship through the rocks and debris to recover cargo left behind from crashes (handily shaped like a crate of bananas).

Objective: To complete each level, retrieve the crates before the time runs out!

Controls: WASD to rotate the ship facing, and Space Bar to boost in the direction you are facing. But be careful! Boosting is the only way you have to make progress, but you go in a straight line and can't turn while you boost. Also, your booster takes a short while to recharge.
